/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings painted in vibrant hues of red and white, their facades adorned with ornate details that hint at the rich architectural heritage of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below.
